mapper.select: select pl.id, pl.production_line_code as productionLineCode, pl.technology_code as technologyCode, pl.serial_number as serialNumber, t.technology_name as technologyName, t.organize_code as organizeCode, ws.workshop_section_code as workshopSectionCode, ws.workshop_section_name as workshopSectionName from t_pro_production_line_technology pl inner join t_pro_technology t on pl.technology_code = t.technology_code inner join t_pro_workshop_section ws on ws.workshop_section_code = t.workshop_section_code where pl.production_line_code = #{productionLineCode} order by pl.serial_number
